Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Cabin VC was founded in March 2018. Cabin VC is a core investment organization in the current development path of the global blockchain industry. The founding team started from the early construction and research of distributed ledger technology.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Affiliated to Cabin VC, Blocklike is a content-oriented media outlet focusing on blockchain technology and bottom ecology. We usually held online video events.
TIDES Panel is Blocklike's roundtable with in-depth topics, which invites core builders in the current hot tracks to share interesting, in-depth, and valuable insights about the industry via Binance Live dialogue. By now, we have held roundtables on the topic of DID, GameFi, Ownership, Metaverse, SocialFi, AAA Games and other topics, which have attracting wide attention in the industry.
